Text: So how many more countries can TPB get "kicked" out of?
Any chance of a upload of all issues of Witchblade from 115 and up? Plus any specials, miniseries, and crossovers?

you're welcome tedsclai. and yes, it really is!

Witchblade 001-147: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6688113/
Witchblade 148-158:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8129348/

that top link was put in the wrong category (e-books).
in the bottom link, there are additional links included in the description for 159-163.

Good lord what was that... 10 pages?!  

Thank god Im not paying money for these, I'd be pissed as all hell.

nazgull2k10, this series is a digital first weekly title, along with ARROW, BATMAN BEYOND, LEGENDS OF THE DARK KNIGHT, SMALLVILLE SEASON 11, TRANSFORMERS: MONSTROSITY, etc., and is always 20 "tablet pages" (which are equivalent to 10 standard comic pages cut in half).

and i don't think you'd be hurting if you did buy it... it's only $0.99 a week, so for $3.96 a month a reader gets 40 pages with no ads.
